*[[Electric Egg#Shops|Shops]] }} ==Description== An '''Electric Egg''' is a type of Pokémon [[Egg]] that can hatch Electric-type Pokémon. ==Hatch Table== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: left;" |- ! rowspan=2|Region !! colspan=8|Pokémon |- !
